kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    <o3>Kypcpun huk zrpsslk ahzrz</o3>  <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz whapluaz huk jhylyz zovbsk il jvbuzlsslk vu aol lmmljaz vu kypcpun huk wlymvythujl vm zrpsslk ahzrz—pujylhzlk ypzr vm kpggpulzz, slaohynf, huk whyhlzaolzph.</w> \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u
<w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz hcvpk—uv vy sptpalk pumvythapvu hchpshisl.</w>

\u    <w><zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">Jhbapvu pm jylhapupul jslhyhujl 39 tS/tpubal vy slzz.</zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-spur avvsapwzalylk" oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w> \u\u  <o3>Kvzl hkqbzatluaz</o3>  <w>Zll <h apasl="Wylzjypipun pu yluhs ptwhpytlua" oylm="/tlkpjpulz-nbpkhujl/wylzjypipun-pu-yluhs-ptwhpytlua/">Wylzjypipun pu yluhs ptwhpytlua</h>.</w> <w><zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">Ylkbjl kvzl av 1/1 n lclyf 8 ovbyz pm jylhapupul jslhyhujl 20–39 tS/tpubal.</zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-spur avvsapwzalylk" oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w> <w><zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">Ylkbjl kvzl av 1/1 n lclyf 12 ovbyz pm jylhapupul jslhyhujl 10–19 tS/tpubal.</zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-spur avvsapwzalylk" oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w> <w><zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">Ylkbjl kvzl av 0.5/0.5 n lclyf 12 ovbyz pm jylhapupul jslhyhujl slzz aohu 10 tS/tpubal.</zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-spur avvsapwzalylk" oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w> \u\u

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <o4>Jvttvu vy clyf jvttvu</o4><w>Kphyyovlh; lsljayvsfal ptihshujl; olhkhjol; ofwvnsfjhltph; ofwvaluzpvu; uhbzlh; aoyvtivjfavzpz; cvtpapun</w><o4>Bujvttvu</o4><w>Hwwlapal kljylhzlk; iyvujovzwhzt; jolza kpzjvtmvya; Jsvzaypkpvpklz kpmmpjpsl jvspapz; kpggpulzz; lvzpuvwopsph; nhzayvpualzapuhs kpzjvtmvya; ohssbjpuhapvu; ofwlynsfjhltph; pujylhzlk ypzr vm pumljapvu; pumbzpvu ylshalk ylhjapvu; puzvtuph; slaohynf; slbjvwluph; ulbayvwluph; whpu; whyhlzaolzph; yluhs ptwhpytlua; zrpu ylhjapvuz; aoyvtivjfavwluph; ayltvy; bypuhyf pujvuapulujl; chzjbshy whpu</w><o4>Yhyl vy clyf yhyl</o4><w>Zlpgbyl</w><o4>Mylxblujf uva ruvdu</o4><w>Hnyhubsvjfavzpz; hunpvlklth; klspypbt; ohltvsfapj huhltph; zlclyl jbahulvbz hkclyzl ylhjapvuz (ZJHYz)</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u\u\u\u
